text: Bette Joan Henritze (May 23, 1924"United States Public Records, 1970-2009", index, FamilySearch (https://familysearch.org/pal:/MM9.1.1/KJWT-82D : accessed August 22, 2014), B Henritze, Residence, New York, New York, United States; from a third party aggregator of publicly available information. â€“ February 22, 2018) was an American actress. She was born in Betsy Layne, Kentucky. She played supporting roles in movies like The World According to Garp, The Hospital, Far From Heaven, and Judy Berlin. She was most known for her work in Off-Broadway theatre. In 1967 she received the Obie Award. Henritze died in Lynbrook, New York on February 22, 2018 at the age of 93. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1924 births Category:2018 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Kentucky Category:Actors from Virginia Category:Actors from New York (state)
title: Bette Henritze
